backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining user profiles, case submissions, payment references, and Stripe checkout logic with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries for all frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document providing the root div and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining layout and all routes for pages including submission, payment, and admin flows.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal requiring new authenticated users to complete name, email, and phone before using the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, and a legal notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides the site header with navigation, logo, and Internet Identity login/logout handling for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/stripe/PaymentSe: Admin-only dialog for configuring Stripe keys and allowed countries, with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods such as user profiles, cases, payments, and Stripe config.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode values, base styles, and print adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint mounting the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard showing all submissions, access control, payment setup, and status badges. Loads submissions and formats timestamps for display.
frontend/src/pages/CardCheckoutPage.tsx: Creates a Stripe checkout session for a submission and redirects the user to Stripe. Displays payment details and handles missing submission IDs.
frontend/src/pages/CaseSubmissionConfirm: Shows a confirmation screen after a case is submitted, displaying the submission ID and next steps. Provides options to proceed to payment or check status later.
frontend/src/pages/CaseSubmissionPage.ts: Allows authenticated users to submit case details and choose a payment method, then creates a case and redirects to confirmation. Validates input and handles errors.
frontend/src/pages/CashAppInstructionsPa: Displays Cash App payment instructions and collects the user's Cash App username for payment verification. Submits the reference and navigates to status tracking.
frontend/src/pages/CashAtStoreReceiptPag: Generates a store payment receipt with a payment code and allows users to mark payment as completed. Loads submission data and supports printing the receipt.
frontend/src/pages/ContactDisclaimerPage: Renders contact info, business hours, and a detailed legal disclaimer using card components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays a four-step explanation of the service process with cards and a final CTA to submit a case.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation notice with options to retry, check status, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Provides selectable payment methods and routes users based on chosen method and submission ID.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentStatusPage.tsx: Allows users to look up case status by submission ID and displays status details with badges.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a confirmation screen after successful payment with next steps and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PayPalInstructionsPag: Guides users through PayPal payment steps and submits a transaction ID tied to a submission ID.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a list of service offerings with descriptions and features plus an important legal notice.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project's styling system.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, requirements, and branding details for Criminal Defence 305.
